box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: The container1 requested 5Gi of memory, but is using only 3Gi now

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 194px; margin-left: 681px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: The container2 requested 10Gi of memory and is using 3.5Gi from the NUMA node 0 and 1Gi from the NUMA node 1

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 344px; margin-left: 21px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
The container2
uses the memory
from
the NUMA node 0
that should be
guaranteed for the
container1
